title: My 4XL has stopped texting photographs
content:
When I try and text a photo, it just hangs up as "sending..." and won't go any further.  I assumed that this was a size problem, but any photo, including one that I compressed down to 49K on my pc and emailed to my phone to text, gets hung up.

Carrier is Verizon
I am using the native Google Messages App
Android version 11

Receiving pictures just fine
Sends texts & emojis ok
Sends video links just fine

I'm not sure when this started, but I texted a photo about 4 days ago (1.4 M) with no issues.
